Function h is graphed. The x-axis goes from negative 4 to 4. The graph consists of a set of line segments and a line segment. The set starts at (negative 4, negative 1), moves horizontally to the right to (negative 1, negative 1), moves upward, and ends at an open circle at (0, 4).
